summary: Full-stack web developer with 7 years of experience building and maintaining production applications for higher education. Specialized in React and Django development with expertise in system architecture, performance optimization, and autonomous feature delivery. Track record of modernizing legacy systems and shipping high-impact projects independently.

experience.title: Web Application Developer
bullets: Full-stack developer responsible for user-facing web infrastructure serving 2,000+ students, faculty, and staff
Architected and executed complete frontend refactoring of CCA Portal from legacy codebase to modern React architecture, improving performance and maintainability
Built and launched online Graduating Students Showcase using React, Django, and Elasticsearchâ€”a full-stack search platform enabling remote senior exhibitions during the pandemic
Independently deliver features from concept to deployment across the entire stack with minimal technical oversight
Maintain production systems on Google Cloud Platform ensuring high availability and performance
Collaborate with project managers, designers, and stakeholders to translate complex requirements into technical solutions
Evaluate and integrate third-party services and APIs into the college's web ecosystem

experience.title: Jr. Web Applications Developer
bullets: Contributed to team initiatives developing technology solutions for college-wide digital infrastructure
Participated in product design and validation activities with cross-functional teams

experience.title: Web Developer (Contract)
bullets: Built websites for small business clients as part of nonprofit technical fellowship program

education.details: Matriculated with Interdisciplinary Honors in the Arts, Phi Beta Kappa
